document.full_text: saudi arabia will begin holding long-delayed municipal elections in april, a ministry said on wednesday, in a limited political move apparently aimed at helping insulate the u.s.-allied kingdom against a wave of arab unrest.
document.title: saudis to hold municipal polls in rare vote
lines_and_colors: saudi arabia will begin holding long-delayed municipal elections in april, a ministry said on wednesday, in a limited political move apparently aimed at helping insulate the u.s.-allied kingdom against a wave of arab unrest.
